text: Michael Haneke (born March 23, 1942) is a Austrian movie director, movie producer, and screenwriter. He is recently known for directing the Academy Award-winning foreign movie Amour. He was nominated for Best Director and Best Screenwriter at the Golden Globe Awards and at the Academy Awards. Haneke was born on March 23, 1942 in Munich, Germany.Lawrence, Chua. "Michael Haneke" , BOMB Magazine, Summer, 2002. Retrieved July 29, 2011. He was raised in Wiener Neustadt. He is remotely related to actor Christoph Waltz. He was raised in Wiener Neustadt. Haneke studied at the University of Vienna. He was married to Susanne Haneke since 1983. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian screenwriters Category:German movie directors Category:German movie producers Category:German screenwriters Category:People from Lower Austria Category:Writers from Munich
title: Michael Haneke
